mapper.select: select key_field, value_field from _sys_tables_ where table_name = #{table_name}

select * from ${tableName} where (_id_, _num_) in ( select _id_, num from ( select _id_, max(_num_) as num from ${tableName} where _id_ > #{preIndex} and _num_ <= #{num} group by _id_ order by _id_ limit #{pageSize}) as tmp)
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `_sys_tables_` ( `_id_` int unsigned auto_increment, `_hash_` varchar(128) default '', `_num_` int(11) default 0, `_status_` int(11) default 0, `table_name` varchar(128) default '', `key_field` varchar(1024) default '', `value_field` varchar(1024) default '', PRIMARY KEY (`_id_`), UNIQUE KEY (table_name) ) ENGINE=InnoDB default charset=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `_sys_consensus_` ( `_id_` int unsigned auto_increment, `_hash_` varchar(128), `_num_` int(11), `_status_` int(11), `name` varchar(128) default 'node', `type` varchar(128), `node_id` varchar(256), `enable_num` varchar(256), PRIMARY KEY (`_id_`), KEY (_num_), KEY (name) ) engine=innodb default charset=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `_sys_table_access_` ( `_id_` int unsigned auto_increment, `_hash_` varchar(128), `_num_` int(11), `_status_` int(11), `table_name` varchar(128), `address` varchar(128), `enable_num` varchar(256), PRIMARY KEY (`_id_`), KEY (table_name) ) engine=innodb default charset=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `_sys_current_state_` ( `_id_` int unsigned auto_increment, `_hash_` varchar(128), `_num_` int(11), `_status_` int(11), `key` varchar(128), `value` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`_id_`), KEY (`key`) ) engine=innodb default charset=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `_sys_number_2_hash_` ( `_id_` int unsigned auto_increment, `_hash_` varchar(128), `_num_` int(11), `_status_` int(11), `number` varchar(128), `value` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`_id_`), KEY (number) ) engine=innodb default charset=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `_sys_tx_hash_2_block_` ( `_id_` int unsigned auto_increment, `_hash_` varchar(128), `_num_` int(11), `_status_` int(11), `hash` varchar(128), `value` longtext, `index` varchar(256), PRIMARY KEY (`_id_`), KEY (hash) ) engine=innodb default charset=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `_sys_hash_2_block_` ( `_id_` int unsigned auto_increment, `_hash_` varchar(128), `_num_` int(11), `_status_` int(11), `hash` varchar(128), `value` LONGTEXT, PRIMARY KEY (`_id_`), KEY (hash) ) engine=innodb default charset=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `_sys_cns_` ( `_id_` int unsigned auto_increment, `_hash_` varchar(128), `_num_` int(11), `_status_` int(11), `name` varchar(128), `version` varchar(128), `address` varchar(256), `abi` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`_id_`), KEY (name) ) engine=innodb default charset=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `_sys_config_` ( `_id_` int unsigned auto_increment, `_hash_` varchar(128), `_num_` int(11), `_status_` int(11), `key` varchar(128), `value` longtext, `enable_num` varchar(256), PRIMARY KEY (`_id_`), KEY (`key`) ) engine=innodb default charset=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `_sys_block_2_nonces_` ( `_id_` int unsigned auto_increment, `_hash_` varchar(128), `_num_` int(11), `_status_` int(11), `number` varchar(128), `value` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`_id_`), KEY (number) ) engine=innodb default charset=utf8mb4;
